That's the right attitude!

By asking the right questions and understanding the dealer's return policy and warranty process, you'll be well-prepared in case you're not satisfied with the scope. It's always better to be safe than sorry, and it's essential to prioritize your needs and expectations as a customer.

Remember, a reputable dealer should be willing to work with you to ensure you're satisfied with your purchase. If they're hesitant or unclear about their return policy or warranty process, it may be a red flag.

Now that you're prepared, go out there and find the perfect scope for your Remington 700! Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Good luck with your scope search, and I hope you find the perfect one for your hunting adventures!
